General.Name: Co2 Capsol AS
General.Description: Capsol Technologies AS provides carbon capture technology solutions using hot potassium carbonate. Its patented Capsol End of Pipe solution is used to capture carbon dioxide from waste-to-energy, cement, biomass, power plants, and industrial facilities. The company was formerly known as CO2 Capsol AS and changed its name to Capsol Technologies AS in June 2023. Capsol Technologies AS was founded in 2014 and is based in Oslo, Norway.
